Contacts Management

Contacts API endpoints.

This module defines all CRUD and search endpoints for managing contacts.

async app.routers.contacts.create_contact_view(contact: ContactCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)) → ContactRead[source]

Create a new contact for the current user.

  • contact: Contact payload (first name, last name, email, phone, birthday).

  • db: Async database session.

  • current_user: Authenticated user object.

Returns the created Contact.

async app.routers.contacts.delete_contact_view(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)) → None[source]

Delete a contact by its ID.

  • contact_id: ID of the contact to delete.

async app.routers.contacts.get_contact_view(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)) → ContactRead[source]

Get a single contact by its ID for the current user.

  • contact_id: ID of the contact to retrieve.

async app.routers.contacts.list_contacts(skip: int = 0, limit: int = 10, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)) → List[ContactRead][source]

Retrieve a paginated list of contacts for the current user.

  • skip: Number of records to skip.

  • limit: Maximum number of records to return.

async app.routers.contacts.search_contacts_view(query: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)) → List[ContactRead][source]

Search contacts by first name, last name or email for the current user.

  • query: Substring to search.

async app.routers.contacts.upcoming_birthdays_view(db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)) → List[ContactRead][source]

Retrieve contacts whose birthdays occur within the next 7 days.

async app.routers.contacts.update_contact_view(contact_id: int, contact_data: ContactUpdate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)) → ContactRead[source]

Update an existing contact.

  • contact_id: ID of the contact to update.

  • contact_data: Fields to change (any subset of first name, last name, email, phone, birthday).
